title: The Fishy Day
author: Luna
pages: A fishing trip sounded perfect today, so off we went to the shore, Mittens, Rufus, and I.
True to form, Mittens snatched a fish with her lightning-fast swipe, while Rufus's excitement overflowed into the water.
Amid the splashes, we pulled a wet and wagging Rufus onto land, laughing at his antics.
Our catch was small, but as we headed home, it was clear we'd reeled in bigger memories.
